level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-163
level.text: For Law 15-163, see notes following ยง 8-2131.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority Pursuant to the Vector-Borne Infectious Diseases Control Act of 2004, see Mayor's Order 2005-145, September 30, 2005 (53 DCR 318).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-168
level.text: Law 19-168, the "Fiscal Year 2013 Budget Support Act of 2012," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-743. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 15, 2012, and June 5, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 22, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-385 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-168 became effective on September 20, 2012.
